<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>ста́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вить.html>вить</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:поставить.html>поста́вить</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-став-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***ставиться.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ставиться.html>ста́виться</a> (9111)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ставить.html>ста́вить</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">stávitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ставиться.html>ста́виться</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">stávitʹsja</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">поста́виться</b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:passive.html>passive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ставить.html>ста́вить</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">stávitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>ста́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вить.html>вить</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — поставиться.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>

<ol><li>несовер. страд. <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ставить.html>ста́вить</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<li><a href = vnd.unilang:идти.html>идти́</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сцена.html>сце́не</a>) <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>

***ставка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ставка.html>ста́вка</a> (3448)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

***ставленник.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ставленник.html>ста́вленник</a> (24096)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ставленник.html>ста́вленник</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">stávlennik</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ставленник.html>ста́вленника</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ставленник.html>ста́вленники</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ставленник.html>ста́вленников</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ста́вленница</b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:henchman.html>henchman</a></li>
<li>protégé</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:стать.html>ста́в</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>лен<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:никнуть.html>ни́к</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-ставл-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-енн-ик</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>тот</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:кто.html>кто</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:получить.html>получи́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:должность.html>до́лжность</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:статус.html>ста́тус</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:желание.html>жела́нию</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:протекция.html>проте́кции</a> кого-либо <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>

***ставший.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:стать.html>ста́вший</a> (11761)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стать.html>ста́вший</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">stávšij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:past.html>past</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> perfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стать.html>стать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">statʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:стать.html>ста́вший</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:действительный.html>Действи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>прича́стие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:прошедший.html>проше́дшего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>

***стадион.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:стадион.html>стадио́н</a> (5417)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадион.html>стадио́н</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">stadión</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадион.html>стадио́на</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадион.html>стадио́ны</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадион.html>стадио́нов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:sport.html>sports</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:stadium.html>stadium</a> (venue <a href = vnd.unilang:where.html>where</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:sport.html>sporting</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:event.html>events</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:are.html>are</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:hold.html>held</a>)</li></ol>

<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>ста</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ди.html>ди</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>о́н</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-стадион-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:сооружение.html>сооруже́ние</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:специальный.html>специально</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:оборудованный.html>обору́дованное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:занятие.html>заня́тий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:физкультура.html>физкульту́рой</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:спорт.html>спо́ртом</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:место.html>места́ми</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:размещение.html>размеще́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:зритель.html>зри́телей</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***стадия.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:стадия.html>ста́дия</a> (5234)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадия.html>ста́дия</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">stádija</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадия.html>ста́дии</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадия.html>ста́дии</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадия.html>ста́дий</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:stage.html>stage</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:phase.html>phase</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:step.html>step</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:переходной.html>перехо́дная</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:стадия.html>ста́дия</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">perexódnaja <b>stádija</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:transition.html>transition</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:stage.html>stage</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>ста́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ди.html>ди</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-стадиj-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-я</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***стадо.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:стадо.html>ста́до</a> (3587)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадо.html>ста́до</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">stado</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*stado</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:herd.html>herd</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:flock.html>flock</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадо.html>ста́до</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">stádo</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадо.html>ста́да</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадо.html>стада́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадо.html>ста́д</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:herd.html>herd</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:flock.html>flock</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стадный.html>ста́дный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">stadnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>ста́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1c  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-стад-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-о</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***стаж.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:стаж.html>стаж</a> (9633)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language"><a href = vnd.unilang:french.html>French</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr"><a href = vnd.unilang:stage.html>stage</a></i>.

<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стаж.html>стаж</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">staž</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стаж.html>ста́жа</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стаж.html>ста́жи</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стаж.html>ста́жей</a></b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:стаж.html>стаж</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 4a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-стаж-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***стажер.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:стажер.html>стажер</a> (13271)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

***стажировка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:стажировка.html>стажиро́вка</a> (20711)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стажировка.html>стажиро́вка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">stažiróvka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стажировка.html>стажиро́вки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стажировка.html>стажиро́вки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стажировка.html>стажиро́вок</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:training.html>training</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:especially.html>especially</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:job.html>job</a>), (<a href = vnd.unilang:period.html>period</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:status.html>status</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:probation.html>probation</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>ста</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>жи<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ров.html>ро́в</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-стаж-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-ир-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ов-к</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

***стайка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:стайка.html>ста́йка</a> (10647)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стая.html>ста́я</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">stája</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ка</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стайка.html>ста́йка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">stájka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стайка.html>ста́йки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стайка.html>ста́йки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стайка.html>ста́ек</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>Diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стая.html>ста́я</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">stája</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: (<a href = vnd.unilang:small.html>small</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:flock.html>flock</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:herd.html>herd</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:pack.html>pack</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:troop.html>troop</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:стая.html>ста́й</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-стай-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:смекалка.html>-к</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***стакан.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:стакан.html>стака́н</a> (1068)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">достаканъ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dostakanŭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkic_languages" class="extiw" title="w:Turkic languages"><a href = vnd.unilang:turkic.html>Turkic</a></a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>compare</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chagatai_language" class="extiw" title="w:Chagatai language">Chagatai</a></span> <small>[<a href = vnd.unilang:script.html>script</a> needed]</small> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="chg-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tostakan</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:wooden.html>wooden</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:bowl.html>bowl</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tatar_language" class="extiw" title="w:Tatar language"><a href = vnd.unilang:tatar.html>Tatar</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="tt">тустыган</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="tt-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tustığan</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:cup.html>cup</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bashkir_language" class="extiw" title="w:Bashkir language">Bashkir</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ba">туҫтаҡ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ba-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tuθtaq</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:cup.html>cup</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:drink.html>drinking</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:koumiss.html>koumiss</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kazakh_language" class="extiw" title="w:Kazakh language"><a href = vnd.unilang:kazakh.html>Kazakh</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="kk">тостаған</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="kk-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tostağan</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:wooden.html>wooden</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cup.html>cup</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>).
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стакан.html>стака́н</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">stakán</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стакан.html>стака́на</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стакан.html>стака́ны</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стакан.html>стака́нов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:drink.html>drinking</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:glass.html>glass</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:стакан.html>стака́н</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:вода.html>воды́</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>stakán</b> vodý</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:glass.html>glass</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:water.html>water</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:стакан.html>стака́н</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:чай.html>ча́ю</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>stakán</b> čáju</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:cup.html>cup</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:tea.html>tea</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>ста</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:кан.html>ка́н</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-стакан-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">сталингра́д</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">Stalingrád</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ский</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-skij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>ста</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>лин<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>гра́дс<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:кий.html>кий</a></b>

Зализняка — 3a✕~.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-сталинград-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ск</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b>.

***сталинизм.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:сталинизм.html>сталини́зм</a> (22552)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<ul><li><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ста́лин</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">Stálin</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-и́зм</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ízm</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сталинизм.html>сталини́зм</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">stalinízm</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сталинизм.html>сталини́зма</a></b>, <i>uncountable</i>)
</p>
<ol><li>Stalinism</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>ста</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ни́зм</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-сталин-</b>; суффикс: <b>-изм</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
